dict.acceptation: 婴儿，幼儿；未成年人；初学者，生手；
婴儿的，幼儿的；幼稚的，幼小的；初期的；未成年的；

sent.orig: Discussed expanding China infant food manufacture and research probiotic application on infant food.
sent.trans: 展望了我国婴幼儿产业的扩展和益生菌应用于婴幼儿食品的研究。

sent.orig: Results: High risk infant were poorer in action than non high risk infant.
sent.trans: 目的：研究高危因素对高危儿在气质维度及分型方面的影响。

sent.orig: Baby and Infant Products, Towels, Childrens Accessories, Rainwear, Purses, Towels, Sun Hats Baby and Infant Products.
sent.trans: 采购产品婴儿和婴儿产品，手巾，孩子配件，雨衣，钱包，手巾，太阳帽子婴儿和婴儿产品。

sent.orig: Settle the infant comfortably, or caregivers to hold and comfort their infant.
sent.trans: 舒适地安置婴儿，或由护理员怀抱并安慰婴儿。

sent.orig: The infant basic gymnastics is a type of body mechanics aiming at promoting the infant growth.
sent.trans: 幼儿基本体操是以幼儿为对象，以增强体质为目的的大众健身体操。
